name: Battle Royale Builder
description: Battle Royale Builder lets you practice Building, Editing, and Shooting with no limits and AI to practice against! No harvesting resources, no sitting in a queue, no severs, no fall damage, just Build, Edit, and Shoot, with or without AI!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 7 Processor: i3+ Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: DX9 Capable DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 10 Processor: i5+ Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: DX11 Capable DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
